member.name: T:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.IntercalibrationMode
member.summary: Intercalibration modes.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.IntercalibrationMode.None
member.summary: No local intercalibration is performed.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.IntercalibrationMode.RotoTranslationDeltaZ
member.summary: Local rototranslation and Z displacement are computed.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.IntercalibrationMode.AffineDeltaZ
member.summary: Local affine transformation and Z displacement are computed. NOTICE: This mode is not yet implemented.

member.name: T:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings
member.summary: Settings for PredictionScan3Driver.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.ScanningConfigId
member.summary: The Id of the scanning program settings.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.LinkConfigId
member.summary: The Id of the linking program settings.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.QualityCutId
member.summary: The Id for quality cut.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.SlopeTolerance
member.summary: Slope tolerance for candidate selection (transverse component and tolerance at zero slope).

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.SlopeToleranceIncreaseWithSlope
member.summary: Slope tolerance increase factor. The actual longitudinal tolerance is "SlopeTolerance + Slope * SlopeToleranceIncreaseWithSlope".

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.PositionTolerance
member.summary: Position tolerance for candidate selection (transverse component and tolerance at zero slope).

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.PositionToleranceIncreaseWithSlope
member.summary: Position tolerance increase factor. The actual longitudinal tolerance is "PositionTolerance + Slope * PositionToleranceIncreaseWithSlope".

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.BaseThickness
member.summary: Expected base thickness. This is used to set the center of the field of view halfway between the two microtracks of the scanback track.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.ReadTolerancesFromPredictionTable
member.summary: If true, the tolerance settings in this configuration are ignored, and tolerances are read from the prediction table.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.SelectionFunction
member.summary: The selection function to be minimized to select the candidate.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.SelectionFunctionMin
member.summary: Minimum acceptable bound for the value of the selection function.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.SelectionFunctionMax
member.summary: Maximum acceptable bound for the value of the selection function.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.MaxTrials
member.summary: Maximum number of trials to search the candidate.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.RecalibrationSelectionText
member.summary: SQL query to select recalibration tracks. If left empty or null, no recalibration is done. The query must return the following fields (in the exact order): POSX POSY SLOPEX SLOPEY. The query can use _BRICK_ and _PLATE_ to denote the current brick and the current plate.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.LocalIntercalibration
member.summary: If set to a value different than None, local intercalibration around average prediction position is performed. In this case, RecalibrationSelectionText is overridden. The size of the area to be used for intercalibration is defined by RecalibrationMinXDistance and RecalibrationMinYDistance. The position tolerance used for pattern matching is RecalibrationPosTolerance. Pattern matching is considered successful if at least RecalibrationMinTracks matches are found.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.LocalDeltaZ
member.summary: This array is used when LocalIntercalibration is different from None. It contains the list of test values for DeltaZ difference from the nominal value. If LocalDeltaZ = <LocalDeltaZ> <double>100</double> <double>0</double> <double>-100</double> </LocalDeltaZ> and the nominal DeltaZ is 1300, intercalibration will be attempted with DeltaZ = 1200, 1300, 1400.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.LocalExcludedDeltaZ
member.summary: This array is used when LocalIntercalibration is different from None. It contains the list of values for DeltaZ for alignments to be excluded. If LocalExcludedDeltaZ = <LocalExcludedDeltaZ> <double>300</double> </LocalExcludedDeltaZ> then tracks that map with DeltaZ = 300 will be excluded from intercalibration (this is the case for transport alignment in OPERA).

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.LocalIntercalibrationLinkConfigId
member.summary: The Id of the linking program settings for local intercalibration (ignored if LocalIntercalibration = None).

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.LocalIntercalibrationQualityCutId
member.summary: The Id for quality cut for local intercalibration (ignored if LocalIntercalibration = None).

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.LocalIntercalibrationMaxSlope
member.summary: Maximum slope accepted for intercalibration. (ignored if LocalIntercalibration = None).

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.LocalIntercalibrationSlopeTolerance
member.summary: Slope tolerance for intercalibration. (ignored if LocalIntercalibration = None).

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.RecalibrationMinXDistance
member.summary: The tracks selected for recalibration must span in the X direction at least a distance equal to RecalibrationMinXDistance. Ignored if no recalibration is to be done.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.RecalibrationMinYDistance
member.summary: The tracks selected for recalibration must span in the Y direction at least a distance equal to RecalibrationMinYDistance. Ignored if no recalibration is to be done.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.RecalibrationMinTracks
member.summary: Recalibration is successful if at least RecalibrationMinTracks are found. Ignored if no recalibration is to be done.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.RecalibrationPosTolerance
member.summary: Position tolerance to find recalibration candidates. Ignored if no recalibration is to be done.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.EnableForking
member.summary: When set to true, enables forking, i.e. yielding multiple candidates for a single prediction.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.EnableSlopePresetting
member.summary: When set to true, tracks are searched using slope preselection.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.SlopePresetXYTolerance
member.summary: Tolerance on microtrack to be applied separately on each projection (X and Y), at slopeX/Y = 0, when slope presetting is enabled. This member is ignored if EnableSlopePresetting is false. The resulting tolerance is SlopePresetXYTolerance + SlopePresetXYToleranceIncreaseWithSlope * abs(Slope[X|Y]).

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.SlopePresetXYToleranceIncreaseWithSlope
member.summary: Tolerance increase on microtrack to be applied separately on each projection (X and Y) when slope presetting is enabled. This member is ignored if EnableSlopePresetting is false. The resulting tolerance is SlopePresetXYTolerance + SlopePresetXYToleranceIncreaseWithSlope * abs(Slope[X|Y]).

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.AskManualScanIfMissing
member.summary: When this flag is set to true, if a scanback track is not found in automatic mode, at the end of the last trial a manual scanning is required. This requires operator presence during scanning.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.ResultFile
member.summary: If null (the default), PredictionScan3Driver will write the results of the search to TB_SCANBACK_PREDICTIONS (if allowed by ). If true, the candidates will be written to a file in the Scratch directory, named "AAAAAAA_XXXXXX_YY_ZZZZZZ.txt", where AAAAA stands for the value of ResultFile, XXXX for the brick number, YY for the plate number, and ZZZZZZZZ for the process operation id.
member.remarks:
The syntax used for the result file is:
ID_EVENTBRICK ID_PLATE PATH ID_PROCESSOPERATION PPX PPY PSX PSY GRAINS AREASUM FPX FPY FSX FSY SIGMA DPX DPY DSX DSY

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.DisableScanAndMoveToNext
member.summary: If false(default), the microscope is directed to go to the next prediction immediately after finishing the scanning. Set to true if this causes mechanical stresses or erratic motion.

member.name: F:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.PredictionScan3Settings.AvoidWritingScanbackPredictions
member.summary: If true, scanning data are written to the DB, but the TB_SCANBACK_PREDICTIONS table is not updated; if false, the TB_SCANBACK_PREDICTIONS table is updated with the found candidates.

member.name: T:SySal.DAQSystem.Drivers.PredictionScan3Driver.Exe
member.summary: PredictionScan3Driver executor.

remarks.para: All input and output live in the DB. Predictions are read from TB_SCANBACK_PREDICTIONS and results are written to the same table.
If needed, forking can be activated to provide multiple results for a single prediction search.
Before real scanning, a recalibration can be computed using "safe" tracks. The selection must return the following columns, in this order: POSX POSY SLOPEX SLOPEY
_BRICK_ will be replaced with the brick ID. _PLATE_ will be replaced with the plate ID.

Supported Interrupts:
IgnoreScanFailure False|True instructs PredictionScan3Driver to stop on failed predictions or to skip them and go on.
IgnoreRecalFailure False|True instructs PredictionScan3Driver to stop on failed recalibration tracks or to skip them and go on.
Type: PredictionScan3Driver /EasyInterrupt for a graphical user interface to send interrupts. Type: PredictionScan3Driver /CSBrick <brick> [<candidate file>] for a graphical user interface to choose candidate tracks in the brick to connect to CS or TT predictions, or try to guess vertices.

The following substitutions apply:
%EXEREP%Executable repository path specified in the Startup file.
%RWDDIR%Output directory for Raw Data.
%TLGDIR%Output directory for linked zones.
%RWD%Scanning output file name (not including extension).
%TLG%Linked zone file name (not including extension).
%SCRATCH%Scratch directory specified in the Startup file.
%ZONEID%Hexadecimal file name for a zone.

Known parameters for selection function:
PLATECurrent Plate.
NGrains.
AAreaSum.
SSigma.
PPX/YPredicted X/Y position.
PSX/YPredicted X/Y slope.
PSL Predicted slope.
FPX/YFound X/Y position.
FSX/YFound X/Y slope.
FSLFound slope.
TX/YX/Y component of transverse unit vector.
LX/YX/Y component of longitudinal unit vector.
DPX/YFound - Predicted X/Y position.
DSX/YFound - Predicted X/Y slope.
DPT/LFound - Predicted Transverse/Longitudinal position.
DST/LFound - Predicted Transverse/Longitudinal slope.
TRIALSNumber of remaining trials for the current prediction.

A sample XML configuration for PredictionScan3Driver follows:
<PredictionScan3Settings> <ScanningConfigId>1000000001587817</ScanningConfigId> <LinkConfigId>1000000000000018</LinkConfigId> <QualityCutId>1000000000000020</QualityCutId> <SlopeTolerance>0.03</SlopeTolerance> <SlopeToleranceIncreaseWithSlope>0.05</SlopeToleranceIncreaseWithSlope> <PositionTolerance>70</PositionTolerance> <PositionToleranceIncreaseWithSlope>6</PositionToleranceIncreaseWithSlope> <MaxTrials>2</MaxTrials> <BaseThickness>210</BaseThickness> <SelectionFunction>(DST / 0.005)^2 + (DSL / (0.005 + PSL * 0.05))^2 + (DPT/20)^2+(DPL/(20+6*PSL))^2</SelectionFunction> <SelectionFunctionMin>0</SelectionFunctionMin> <SelectionFunctionMax>18</SelectionFunctionMax> <RecalibrationSelectionText>select POSX, POSY, SLOPEX, SLOPEY from (select ID_ZONE, POSX, POSY, SLOPEX, SLOPEY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ID_ZONE ORDER BY ID) AS RNUM from TB_MIPBASETRACKS where ID_EVENTBRICK = _BRICK_ and ID_ZONE in (select ID from TB_ZONES where ID_EVENTBRICK = _BRICK_ and ID_PROCESSOPERATION in (select CALIBRATION from VW_PLATES where ID_EVENTBRICK = _BRICK_ and ID = _PLATE_)) and GRAINS > 27 and SQRT(SLOPEX*SLOPEX+SLOPEY*SLOPEY) < 0.25 and SQRT(SLOPEX*SLOPEX+SLOPEY*SLOPEY) > 0.05) where RNUM <= 5</RecalibrationSelectionText> <RecalibrationMinXDistance>30000</RecalibrationMinXDistance> <RecalibrationMinYDistance>30000</RecalibrationMinYDistance> <RecalibrationMinTracks>8</RecalibrationMinTracks> <RecalibrationPosTolerance>60</RecalibrationPosTolerance> <ReadTolerancesFromPredictionTable>False</ReadTolerancesFromPredictionTable> <EnableForking>False</EnableForking> </PredictionScan3Settings>

para.b: NOTICE: If the quality cut id is identical to the linker id, no quality cut is applied (unless the linker applies its own quality cuts).

remarks.para:
A dump file is generated in the Scratch directory, with the name predictionscan3driver_operationid_brick_plate.txt and containing an n-tuple with the following fields:
BRICKThe id of the brick.
PLATEThe id of the plate.
PATHThe path number.
TRIALSThe trials remaining (not the trials done).
GRAINSThe number of grains of the candidate (or zero if no candidate is found).
SIGMAThe Sigma of the candidate (negative for microtracks, positive for base tracks, zero for no candidate).
